text: @realDonaldTrump Dude, you had Steve Mnuchin insert $1.75B in the #COVID19 relief bill for a new FBI bldg because YOU didn’t want competition from another hotel. Yet YOU & Radical Republicans are reducing the $600 addl UI payment that’s desperately needed bcause you’re worried about deficits. 🤦🏽‍♀️
